title: Boundary Conditions Schema
description: Schema for validating boundary condition metadata in simulation pipelines. Supports inlet, outlet, and wall definitions with physical parameters.

role.description: Semantic role of the boundary condition

apply_faces.description: Faces to which the condition is applied

faces.description: List of face IDs associated with boundary conditions (can include negative IDs for synthesized boundaries)

apply_to.description: Physical quantities affected by the condition

pressure.description: Pressure value for the boundary condition (Pa)

velocity.description: Velocity vector [vx, vy, vz] in m/s

no_slip.description: Whether the no-slip condition is applied (true = zero tangential velocity)

comment.description: Optional human-readable description of the boundary condition's physical role
